about.title: About the Series
about.description: The Digital City Series is a collection of digital artworks by Bernard Bolter that explores urban environments through a unique artistic lens.
about.artistDescription: Bernard Bolter is a San Francisco native who has lived in Copenhagen since 2009. His work explores the intersection of urban environments and digital art.
